product_name: La Roche-PosayMela B3 Dark Spot Face Cleanser with Melasyl and Niacinamide
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Mela B3 Dark Spot Face Cleanser exfoliates and cleanses skin to reveal a more even skin tone, while visibly reducing dark spots.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle micro-peeling cleanser exfoliates to reveal a more even skin toneMaintains the natural moisture barrier and pHAfter 4 weeks, skin tone looks more even and spots appears less visibleDermatologist and Allergy TestedNon-ComedogenicBottle made from 99% recycled plastic, excluding the pump.Key IngredientsMelasyl, the newest, exclusive La Roche-Posay ingredient targets discoloration, while respecting the natural tone of all skinNiacinamide, a vitamin B3 helps visibly fade skin discolorationFormulated WithoutOilSulfateItem 2625720How To UseWet skin & work cleanser into a lather, rinse & pat dry. reviews.headline: I would  buy this product  again
reviews.comments: I love these products  from this company.  It actually  does what it says.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again.
reviews.comments: I've used it for 3 weeks. I can see the lighting of my dark spots.

reviews.headline: Caused cystic acne
reviews.comments: I used this with the corresponding face serum for 3 weeks and it caused a major breakout of deep painful acne all over my face. When I quit using it, my skin rapidly healed and has been fine since. I don't know what ingredient caused this (maybe the high concentration of niacinamide?) but this product isn't for me. It did lighten hyperigmentation but didn't improve melasma.

reviews.headline: Oh my God????
reviews.comments:
As a neurodivergent, I flock to products that deliver, deliver quickly, can accomplish several jobs at once, and don't leave me wanting to wipe it all off to escape the feeling once I'm done. It's rough out here lol, especially with darker, sensitive skin bc so much just isn't formulated to work as well for us, whether you're consistent or not.

But this? Unicorns are real, y'all. I use it with the rest of the Mela B3 line, but this cleanser is a standout on its own. Yk how sometimes you wipe toner over your face and dead skin gets on the cotton pad? NOT ANYMORE. It's fading dark spots I though were gonna outlive me, and I haven't even been using it all everyday. I'm glowing after just CLEANSER, and I don't have to put up with tight skin for it! T•T And it plays well with my other products, too!

I bought the whole B3 line on impulse and am keeping everything. Prepare to be SICKA ME!! More and more brands are remembering us black and brown skin girlies while they cook in the lab. And La Roche-Posay has gone above and beyond with cute, purple packaging to match.

Stuff like this makes it easier for people like me to maintain and genuinely get excited about self care. I never would've thought this is how good things could get.

reviews.headline: Works wonders but dries your face
reviews.comments: I bought this cleanser as a substitute for the serum version as it was more affordable and somehow the cleanser managed to not only lighten my dark spots but my face overall. I have never seen my face this cleared up from acne and I have extremely stubborn skin. The biggest concern I have about this product is that its super drying. It has dried my face to the extent where some parts experience peeling/flaking. Due to this, I had to use extra moisturizer or hydrating products as the product can cause redness as well. A little goes a long way, make sure not to use too much otherwise your skin will be harmed rather than healed.

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: I love how it lathers you don't need to much

reviews.headline: I would buy this forever!
reviews.comments: I just bought it, been using it for a week consistently and i already see results! I am obsessed & it smells soo good!

reviews.headline: Definitely worth a try
reviews.comments: This has lightened up dark spots due tl sun as well as almost completely reduced a small mole that needed checking.  I was using the serum as well, so that could attribute to that.  Still, skin felt soft and smooth after washing face.

reviews.headline: Broke me out badly.
reviews.comments: I used this and corresponding melasyl serum daily for approximately 3 weeks before having one of the worst breakouts of my life. My face erupted in cytsic acne. As soon as I quit using these products, my skin rapidly healed. I have used niacinamide before but not at this high of concentration. Not sure if it's that or some other ingredient that aggravated my skin. It did not reduce my skin sebum at all nor help with mild melasama, but it did somewhat help reduce other hyperpigmentation and surface redness. It cleaned the skin well without drying it, so I liked it at first and had high hopes. Obviously not a product for me though.

reviews.headline: 100% Gentle Exfoliation
reviews.comments: I got this less for evening skintone, but more for gentle exfoliation. I have pretty congested skin with a very oily tzone but dry elsewhere. This both treats the congestion through exfoliation but balances out my entire face really well without drying out or irritation. Ive noticed a huge difference in my pore size. Very much recommend if your skin sounds like mine.

reviews.headline: Would not buy this product again.
reviews.comments: The amount you get for the price is not for me. I found a different brand that's a little more expensive but you get more ounces and I am already seeing great results.

reviews.headline: So far so good
reviews.comments: First time with this brand ~ I love the feel of this cleanser. Its not super foamy/sudsy, with little scent. Too early to tell if it does what it claims, but I'm willing to keep using to find out.

reviews.headline: Not great for pre-existing dark spots
reviews.comments: I've been using this for about 3 months now and it hasn't cleared up my skin as much as I would like. I've had previous dark spots that it maybe lightened a bit but very minimal. But I will say on new marks I got while using this it worked pretty well.

reviews.headline: I will buy again

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This made me break out and I'll be returning it. I have  Dry sensitive skin but wanted to give it a try. My dermatologist suggested the effaclar in the morning and a gentle cleanser at night instead. It foams very well though

reviews.comments: Im a huge fan of the b3 serum and have seen great results. Im dissapointed the wash did not work for me as it has for many people i am 23. Would still recommend. Has no smell. Great texure only need small amount

This facial wash is amazing!!
Gentle, but it works. I can see it working and each time I wash and use the Serum to clear dark spots. Great product!

reviews.headline: Surprising Cleanser
reviews.comments: This cleanser really surpised me. It foams well and feels great on the skin. It doesn't make my skin feel dry after. I'm starting to notice my skin becoming brighter. I wish it was fragrance free but I would still purchase it again.

reviews.headline: Unbelievable product!
reviews.comments: Let me start by saying I have severe dark spots on my face. I have tried so many different products and none of them have worked like this! I've been using this for about three weeks now and I am already starting to see a difference! Not only are my dark spots fading, my face feels amazing! I highly recommend!

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Mela-B3 Gel Cleanser has a lightweight gel texture that feels refreshing on the skin. It lathers up nicely and effectively removes dirt, oil, and impurities without leaving the skin feeling stripped or dry. I appreciate that it thoroughly cleanses the skin without causing any irritation or redness.

One of the standout features of this cleanser is its powerful blend of active ingredients. It contains Vitamin B3 (niacinamide), Vitamin C, and salicylic acid, which work together to brighten the skin, fade dark spots, and promote a more even complexion. These ingredients are known for their skin-brightening and exfoliating properties, making the Mela-B3 Gel Cleanser an excellent choice for those struggling with hyperpigmentation.

After using the cleanser for a few weeks, I noticed a visible improvement in my skin's tone and texture. My dark spots started to fade, and my skin appeared more radiant and even. Additionally, the cleanser helped to unclog my pores and minimize the appearance of blemishes, leaving my skin looking clearer and healthier.

I also appreciate that the Mela-B3 Gel Cleanser is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. La Roche-Posay is known for its gentle and dermatologist-tested formulations, and this cleanser is no exception. It is free from harsh irritants and is non-comedogenic, meaning it won't clog pores or cause breakouts.

Another great aspect of this cleanser is its refreshing scent. It has a light and pleasant fragrance that adds to the overall sensory experience of using the product.

In terms of packaging, the Mela-B3 Gel Cleanser comes in a convenient pump bottle, which makes it easy to dispense the right amount of product. It also helps to keep the cleanser hygienic and prevents any wastage.

Overall, I highly recommend the La Roche-Posay Mela-B3 Gel Cleanser for anyone looking to brighten their skin, fade dark spots, and achieve a more even complexion. Its gentle yet effective formula, combined with its refreshing texture and pleasant scent, make it a standout cleanser in the skincare market. Give it a try, and you'll likely see noticeable improvements in your skin's appearance.
